secret_rule: The item can be brought to the picnic only if its name is a single-word noun that starts with the letter 'B'.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Bicycle" and "Book".
I would like to try bringing "Butterfly" to the game. Can it be brought?
I would like to try bringing "Banana" to the game. Can it be brought?
The secret rule appears to be that you can bring any item to the game as long as it starts with the letter "B."
